attributes.action: Tell us if you know why the public doesn't trust politicians over the DNA Database or the new Communications Bill.
attributes.additional_details: Could it be because we have no confidence that our politicians could resist the opportunity to use the information in both systems against an organisation or an individual if it meant they could benefit from such activity in a financial way, and then, when it is discovered, the misuse of the information will be fobbed off as "not breaking any rules".
